CustomField.description: This field will be used for Expere Doc Prep, which has not yet been implemented. This field is not required. If enabled, a margin is used in determining the interest rate for a variable rate account. If disabled, this field is not used. By default, it is disabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true a margin is used in determining the interest rate for a variable rate account.
CustomField.label: Interest Rate Margin Indicator
